Title: The Way of the Tushui
Description:
It's a pleasure to meet you, $c. I am Aysa, of the Tushui.

I've spent much time in thought since Master Shang told me we would be searching for Huo, the spirit of fire. I know where he resides, but not how to reach him. The answers are close, however.

Come with me to the Cave of Meditation nearby. It is a place of great wisdom. I will meditate there, open my mind, and the path shall find us.
RewardText:
Your path is set before you. You will be the one to rekindle the spirit of fire and bring it to the safety of the temple.

This will not be the only time you and Aysa work together. She is strong and wise. You can trust in her.
